mapper.select: SELECT '超级大乐透' AS name, 'LOTTO' AS en_name, issue_number, award_date, ROUND(bonus_pool * POW(10, -8), 2) as bonus_pool, CONCAT(red1, ',', red2, ',', red3, ',', red4, ',', red5) AS red_balls, CONCAT(blue1, ',', blue2) AS blue_balls, first_prize_number, first_prize_amount, second_prize_number, second_prize_amount FROM lotto WHERE issue_number < #{minIssueNumber} ORDER BY issue_number DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}
